usage_guide.p: This annex describes usages of this module.

example.p: Equipment on a ship requires power through an interface (identified as 'Panel power supply'). The interface specification belongs to the product categories "POWER" and "IFS".
The interface specification has a version (identified as 'SN0001 design').
A power supply (identified as '420V 50Hz') and an alarm panel (identified as 'Panel RG 431') require connectors.
The panel connector has a design.
Actual connectors exist. The actual panel connector corresponds to the panel connector design.
The actual connectors are part of an actual power supply and actual alarm panel.
The connectors conform to the interface specification.
